channel.title: OpenSlaw.ai Release Notes
channel.description: Changelog for the world's first AI-powered open-source coleslaw recipe. Autonomously optimized for lobster pairing.

item.title: v1.3.0 — Mayo Hallucination Guardrails
item.description: Added mayo hallucination guardrails after The Incident. All slaw outputs now pass through MayoGuard v2.

item.title: v1.2.0 — Slaw Doom FPS
item.description: Slaw Doom FPS added to Slaw Labs Arcade. Fight through 3 mayo-infested levels.

item.title: v1.1.1 — Potato Salad Bug Fix
item.description: Fixed bug where AI was generating potato salad instead of coleslaw. Shred width guardrails tightened.

item.title: v1.1.0 — Multi-Modal Cabbage Understanding
item.description: Introduced multi-modal cabbage understanding (MMCU). The model can now accept photos of cabbage.

item.title: v1.0.0 — Stable Release
item.description: Stable release — citrus slaw with full agentic lobster-pairing support.

item.title: v0.2.0 — Mayo Removal (Breaking Change)
item.description: Swapped mayo for olive oil + ACV. Breaking change: texture now enjoyable. Retrained all slaw agents.

item.title: v0.1.0 — Proof of Concept
item.description: Proof of concept. Mostly cabbage. The AI recommended raisins. We fired the AI.
